name: Neant
text: As despair takes hold of you once again, you reflect on the past.

name: Neant
text: What was the starting point of this endless spiral ?

name: Neant
text: Was it when your friend left ?

name: Neant
text: Was it in the despair of your search ?

name: Neant
text: Was it at the heart of all your problems, which you were supposed to face here ?

name: Neant
text: Or was it when you decided to refuse an outstretched hand only to return to your constant despair ?

name: Neant
text: Which of these opportunities to take the final step should have been the right one for you ?
